programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mini decides to get reading glasses for her grand father, as a surprise birthday gift. With rescue team member Jin’s help, Mini makes reading glasses and heads back home.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Let’s play together, Poke & Thank you, Cleany
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Poke, being a mute, is not able to play word puzzle with his friends. Discouraged by this fact, Poke decides to run away, far from his friends.

programme.sub-title: Spooky and swarm of bees & I like myself
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Spooky, while on his way to the picnic, finds a bee and starts to follow it.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Annie is sad that unlike other friend’s parents, her parents are very busy to take her to on a trip. When Schoolbi hears her story, he decides to take Annie out on a short trip.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: A friend under the sea & Thinking of granddaughter
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Marine brings a singing dolphin, Mingming, to a harbor and introduces Mingming to friends. On that night, Mingming accidentally swallows a can which has been thrown away in the ocean.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Recycling machine gets broken at Cleany’s recycling center, and trashes start to pile up. Cleany tries to clean up the mess and accidentally runs over the glue and gets stuck.

programme.sub-title: I want it & Where are you, Jin
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mini finds the snowball which Mr.Wheeler has lost. However, when Mr. Wheeler comes back to look for it, Mini lies to him, wanting to keep the snowball.

programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - At the construction site, Poke finds a dandelion while digging the ground. Poke decides to keep the dandelion alive and plants it in the remote area without telling anyone.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Brave Mr. Musty & Please hear me out
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mr. Musty goes to the toy store with ‘Little Trio’ and in the store, he spots TRUCK X who kidnaps ‘Tiny Trio’. Mr. Musty chases TRUCK X but he is too old to catch him.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Whenever Cap gets muddy on his body, he stops playing and goes to wash off. Wanting to keep the body clean, Cap stays and keeps putting on soap in the car wash machine.

programme.sub-title: Harmony of Broomstown part 1 & Harmony of Broomstown part 2
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Jin announces the shocking news that there will be a audition for choir members, and the members will participate in the big choir contest held in the big city.

programme.sub-title: Don’t worry SchoolB & Bruner's Little cousin

programme.sub-title: Rody is a liar & Greedy Mr. Wheeler
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Rody lies for fun. Rody often finds it amusing to trick others and keeps lying. One day, however, Whooper gets into dangerous accident because of Rody’s lie.
